definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 468:a. I. [[כור]], 1. 4: kuwrun means also a camel’s saddle (or ‘howdah’) with its apparatus, v. Frey Lane.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: —I. [[[כָּר]]]: for basket-saddle read < camelpalankeen; the palankeen, or tent-like erection, on the saddle (Burckh:Bedoulns and Wahábys, 266 Doughty:Arab. Des. i. 437. ii. 304 Lane:Mod. Egyptians (5) ii. 158 al.), which seems intended here, is distinct from the basket or pannier (in which some women also traveled, Porter:Travels ii. 232.).
